item.title: The future was examined at the GREAT Festival of Innovation in Hong Kong
item.description:
The second day of the GREAT Festival of Innovation in Hong Kong brought together over 50 prominent figures from various industries to discuss the future of living. The event, which ran until March 24th, featured experts, business leaders, and creatives sharing their insights with attendees from around the world. With a focus on the prediction that 70% of the global population will reside in urban areas by 2050, the festival examined the implications for how we live, eat, travel, and interact with the natural world through panels and demonstrations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-future-was-examined-at-the-great-festival-of-innovation-in-hong-kong/

item.title: The Drone Experience Program by JW Marriott Luxury Hotels & Resorts is launching in China
item.description:
Source: JW Marriott Luxury Hotels & Resorts. View from a DJI drone. JW Marriott Luxury Hotels & Resorts and drone manufacturer DJI have partnered to introduce the brand’s first Drone Experience Program. This program will allow guests to try out DJI’s drone technology and experience JW Marriott properties from a fresh perspective. They can also capture and share these unique moments with loved ones. Launching on November 12, 2016, at JW Marriott Zhejiang Anji, the program will feature on-site sessions hosted by DJI experts...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-drone-experience-program-by-jw-marriott-luxury-hotels-resorts-is-launching-in-china/

item.title: Preorders for GoPro HERO5 cameras and Karma drones are now available at Shopee Malaysia
item.description:
Shopee, a popular online marketplace in Southeast Asia and Taiwan, is now offering preorders for the new GoPro HERO5 cameras. Source: GoPro. The HERO5 series. GoPro’s founder and CEO, Nicholas Woodman, introduced the HERO5 on September 19th, alongside a cloud-based software platform and the Karma drone. Woodman emphasized the company’s commitment to easy storytelling: “With these new products, we’re making it simpler to capture and share compelling stories. HERO5’s automatic photo and video uploads to GoPro Plus streamline the entire process of editing, sharing, and enjoying your experiences on the go...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/preorders-for-gopro-hero5-cameras-and-karma-drones-are-now-available-at-shopee-malaysia/
